description: Have you ever tried to develop a cool modern youTube homepage? Maybe no. That's why Plato is here to help you to learn how to turn a normal photoshop design into a cool layout in the browser. From the design, until the pages go live, youâ€™ll get expert guidance on how to make sure your first steps gets done, and done right. This is not a beginners course and some knowledge of HTML5, CSS3 is required. You will also get hands-on with some jQuery and learn some very beautiful ways to help take the homepage to the next level!
title: HTML5 & CSS3: Build a Modern Youtube Homepage From Scratch
